room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Great escape room company.  Fun room.  Difficult, but also enjoyable and surprising.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My family, party of 5, did the Kidnapping room.  Sam was our coach.  It was a really fun activity to do with adults and teenagers.  We got out with 2 minutes to spare.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We completed the Kidnapping room yesterday and it was a blast. We've been here twice and both time we've had an excellent experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We went with our family. 4 kids ages 8 to 13. We played the Kidnapping and it was so much fun. We loved it.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Our family had a blast at Breakout today! The five of us were joined by another couple in the Kidnap room. We ended up beating it with about 3 minutes to go!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Awesome game. My 6-year-old and 3-year-old even came and did not get scared of the Kidnapping. Do not recommend to most young kids though, mine aren't scared of anything.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Plano in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: It was a lot of fun! Will definitely be going back. We took my boyfriend there for his birthday and we did the kidnapping! Really good team exercise!
